title: What you need to find out about Limo Hire Prices
text:
* Tolls 
* Anything else they can add on to boost the price 
Thankfully these situations are very rare nevertheless they do happen. Be sure that when you ask about the price of hiring a limousine you'll be given the total cost for the journey and the extras. This is particularly vital if you're booking a limo for a third party like a wedding or younger kids celebrating prom night. 
Minimum hire times 
The vast majority of limousine companies will have a minimum rental time of two or three hours. Buying and looking after these vehicles is not cheap and these companies have to ensure that they cover their expenses. 
Tipping the limo driver 
Most people do tip the limo driver with around 20% of the total cost being the normal amount. But if your limousine driver has provided a really remarkable service do feel free to tip a more substantial amount than that. Some limo companies will include this in your cost so check that, to ensure that the tip has not already been included. 
Limo Hire Prices do differ however, so does the standard of service. Ensure that you understand exactly what you are spending money on prior to the trip.
